content.text:
# Lucky Summer Ward

Lucky Summer Ward is a ward in Ruaraka Constituency, Nairobi County, Kenya. It has a population of around 30,000 people and covers 1.95 km2.
Victor Omondi Ochola(Ringo) represents the ward on the Nairobi City County Assembly, and Sospeter Anduru is the Ward Administrator. It was formerly part of the Kasarani constituency.
